objects.__Episode__synopsis: Contra a vontade de Cersei, Tyrion envia ela e a filha de Jaime, Myrcella, para Dorne para proteção. Theon captura Winterfell e executa Sor Rodrik Cassel. Osha, o Wildling cativo, junto com Hodor, ajuda Bran e Rickon a escapar. Robb se reúne com a curandeira, Talisa Maegyr. No Punho dos Primeiros Homens, Jon captura uma selvagem chamada Ygritte, mas é separado de sua patrulha enquanto a persegue depois que ela escapa. Joffrey incita um motim em Porto Real, no qual ele quase é morto e Sansa quase estuprada. Tywin permite que Mindinho busque a fidelidade dos Tyrell. Em Harrenhal, Arya manda H'ghar matar um oficial que suspeita dela. Robb recebe notícias sobre a traição de Theon e envia homens para retomar Winterfell. Em Qarth, Daenerys trabalha para conseguir um navio para transportar um exército para Westeros enquanto mantém Daxos à distância. Uma das empregadas de Daenerys é morta e seus dragões roubados.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Theon assume o controle de Winterfell. Jon captura uma selvagem, chamada Ygritte. O povo de Porto Real começa a se voltar contra o Rei Joffrey. Daenerys procura comprar navios para navegar pelos Sete Reinos.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E6 - The Old Gods and the New
objects.__Episode__title_short: Os Deuses Antigos e os Novos

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Against Cersei's wishes, Tyrion sends her and Jaime's daughter, Myrcella, to Dorne for protection. Theon captures Winterfell and executes Ser Rodrik Cassel. Osha, the captive Wildling, along with Hodor, helps Bran and Rickon escape. Robb reunites with the healer, Talisa Maegyr. At the Fist of the First Men, Jon captures a Wildling named Ygritte, but is separated from his patrol while pursuing her after she escapes. Joffrey incites a riot at King's Landing, in which he is nearly killed and Sansa almost raped. Tywin allows Littlefinger to seek the Tyrells' allegiance. At Harrenhal, Arya has H'ghar kill an officer who is suspicious of her. Robb receives news about Theon's treachery and sends men to retake Winterfell. At Qarth, Daenerys works to procure a ship to transport an army to Westeros while keeping Daxos at bay. One of Daenerys' maids is killed and her dragons stolen.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Theon seizes control of Winterfell. Jon captures a wildling, named Ygritte. The people of King's Landing begin to turn against King Joffrey. Daenerys looks to buy ships to sail for the Seven Kingdoms.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E6 - The Old Gods and the New
objects.__Episode__title_short: The Old Gods and the New

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Joffrey deixa Sansa de lado para se casar com Margaery Tyrell e aliar-se à família Tyrell. Tyrion teme pela segurança dele e de Shae depois que Tywin é nomeado Mão do Rei. Melisandre dá a Stannis uma nova esperança. Brienne mata soldados Stark depois que eles reconhecem Jaime. Catelyn não consegue dissuadir Robb de se casar com Talisa, quebrando sua promessa de se casar com a filha de Walder Frey. Em Qarth, dentro da Casa dos Imortais, Daenerys entra em um simulacro de uma sala destruída do Trono de Ferro e se reúne com o que parece ser Khal Drogo e seu filho recém-nascido. Sabendo que é irreal, ela sai e recupera com sucesso seus dragões, que queimam fatalmente Pree, que tenta aprisioná-la. Ela sela Daxos e seu servo traidor dentro de seu cofre vazio e reivindica seus outros bens, com os quais Jorah pagará por um pequeno navio. Em Winterfell, Theon quer que seus homens lutem contra o exército de Robb, mas eles o deixam inconsciente e vão embora; Winterfell é incendiado. Fatalmente ferido Meistre Luwin convence Osha a fugir com Brandon e Rickon para a Muralha para a proteção de Jon. Depois que Arya, Torta Quente e Gendry escapam de Harrenhal, H'ghar dá a Arya uma moeda não monetária que ele diz que pode ser usada para encontrá-lo em Bravos. Antes dela, ele magicamente muda seu rosto. Ao norte da Muralha, Halfhand força Jon a matá-lo para provar sua lealdade aos Wildlings. Um exército de Caminhantes Brancos e homens mortos cerca o Punho dos Primeiros Homens; Sam se esconde, observando horrorizado enquanto eles passam.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Joffrey coloca Sansa de lado por Margaery Tyrell. Robb se casa com Talisa Maegyr. Jon se prepara para conhecer Mance Rayder. Arya se despede de Jaqen H'ghar. Daenerys tenta resgatar seus dragões.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E10 - Valar Morghulis

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Joffrey sets Sansa aside to marry Margaery Tyrell and ally with the Tyrell family. Tyrion fears for his and Shae's safety after Tywin is named Hand of the King. Melisandre gives Stannis a new hope. Brienne kills Stark soldiers after they recognize Jaime. Catelyn fails to dissuade Robb from marrying Talisa, breaking his promise to wed Walder Frey's daughter. In Qarth, inside the House of the Undying, Daenerys enters a simulacrum of a destroyed Iron Throne room, then is reunited with what appears to be Khal Drogo and their infant son. Knowing it is unreal, she leaves and successfully retrieves her dragons, who fatally burn Pree, who tries to imprison her. She seals Daxos and her traitorous servant inside his empty vault and claims his other possessions, with which Jorah will pay for a small ship. In Winterfell, Theon wants his men to fight Robb's army, but they knock him unconscious and leave; Winterfell is torched. Fatally wounded Maester Luwin convinces Osha to escape with Brandon and Rickon to the Wall for Jon's protection. After Arya, Hot Pie, and Gendry escape Harrenhal, H'ghar gives Arya a non-monetary coin he says can be used to find him in Braavos. Before her, he magically changes his face. North of the Wall, Halfhand forces Jon to kill him to prove his loyalty to the Wildlings. An army of White Walkers and dead men surrounds the Fist of the First Men; Sam hides, watching in horror as they pass.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Joffrey puts Sansa aside for Margaery Tyrell. Robb marries Talisa Maegyr. Jon prepares to meet Mance Rayder. Arya says farewell to Jaqen H'ghar. Daenerys tries to rescue her dragons.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E10 - Valar Morghulis

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E2 - The House of Black and White
objects.__Episode__title_short: A Casa do Preto e Branco

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Arya arrives in Braavos and is accepted into the "House of Black and White" by Jaqen H'ghar, who calls himself and his colleagues, "no one". Jaime recruits Bronn to travel to Dorne with him to retrieve Jaime's niece/daughter Myrcella, who is now betrothed to Trystane Martell, Prince Doran's son. Podrick recognises Littlefinger and Sansa in a tavern; Brienne offers Sansa her protection but is rebuffed. Littlefinger insists Brienne come with them, but she refuses and escapes with Podrick, then secretly follows Sansa. Stannis offers Jon legitimacy and lordship of Winterfell if he leaves the Night's Watch and supports him, but Jon keeps his vow to the Night's Watch; Samwell nominates Jon as Lord Commander against Alliser Thorne; Maester Aemon casts his ballot for Jon, breaking a tie vote. Daenerys incites a riot by executing a former slave who murdered a Sons of the Harpy prisoner prior to his trial. Drogon reappears, but soon leaves.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Arya arrives in Braavos. Jaime takes on a secret mission. Ellaria Sand seeks revenge for Oberyn's death. Stannis makes Jon a generous offer as the Night's Watch elects a new Lord Commander. Daenerys is faced with a difficult decision.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E2 - The House of Black and White
objects.__Episode__title_short: The House of Black and White

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: O espião eunuco do rei Robert, Varys, descobriu que Daenerys Targaryen está grávida. Ned rejeita o plano de Robert de assassiná-la, considerando que Daenerys não é uma ameaça. Ele renuncia em protesto como Mão de Robert, irritando o rei. Catelyn e seu prisioneiro, Tyrion, chegam à fortaleza de sua irmã Lysa Arryn no Ninho da Águia. As notícias da captura de Tyrion chegam a Porto Real, onde Jaime Lannister, irmão gêmeo da rainha, exige respostas de Ned. Um Jaime vingativo ordena que os homens de Ned sejam mortos e luta contra Ned até que o homem de Jaime esfaqueia Ned na perna por trás, deixando-o ferido.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Catelyn capturou Tyrion e planeja trazê-lo para sua irmã, Lysa Arryn, no Vale, para ser julgado por seus supostos crimes contra Bran. Robert planeja matar Daenerys, mas Eddard se recusa a fazer parte disso e desiste.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S01E5 - The Wolf and the Lion

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: King Robert's eunuch spy, Varys, has uncovered that Daenerys Targaryen is pregnant. Ned rejects Robert's plan to assassinate her, considering Daenerys a non-threat. He resigns in protest as Robert's Hand, angering the king. Catelyn and her prisoner, Tyrion, arrive at her sister Lysa Arryn's fortress home in the Eyrie. News of Tyrion's capture reaches King's Landing where Jaime Lannister, the Queen's twin brother, demands answers from Ned. A vengeful Jaime orders Ned's men killed and fights Ned until Jaime's man stabs Ned in the leg from behind, leaving him wounded.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Catelyn has captured Tyrion and plans to bring him to her sister, Lysa Arryn, at the Vale, to be tried for his, supposed, crimes against Bran. Robert plans to have Daenerys killed, but Eddard refuses to be a part of it and quits.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S01E5 - The Wolf and the Lion

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E10 - Mother's Mercy

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Selyse, now distraught over Shireen's death, hangs herself, while half of Stannis' forces desert and Melisandre flees to Castle Black. The Boltons easily defeat Stannis' depleted army. Brienne finds Stannis on the battlefield and executes him for Renly Baratheon's murder. Theon kills Myranda after she catches him and Sansa attempting to escape Winterfell. The duo leap from the outer wall together. Cersei confesses her former relationship with Lancel and must atone by parading the streets naked, pelted with garbage, spit, and feces by jeering crowds. Upon reaching the Red Keep, Qyburn introduces her to the newest Kingsguard member who is completely loyal. Jaime, Myrcella, Bronn, and Trystane set sail from Dorne, but Myrcella has been poisoned by Ellaria Sand and soon dies. Arya is punished, losing her sight, for violating the Faceless Men rules after killing Trant for personal revenge. Varys arrives in Meereen to govern the city with Tyrion, Grey Worm, and Missandei, while Daario and Jorah search for Daenerys, who has been captured by a Dothraki horde. Samwell, Gilly, and Little Sam leave Castle Black for Oldtown where Samwell will train as a Maester. Mutineers, including Alliser Thorne and Jon's steward, Olly, fatally stab Jon, leaving his body in the courtyard.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Stannis arrives at Winterfell. Tyrion runs Meereen as Daario and Jorah go after Daenerys. Jaime and Myrcella leave Dorne. Jon sends Sam and Gilly to Oldtown. Arya challenges the Many-Faced God. Cersei confesses her sins.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E10 - Mother's Mercy

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Arya escapa da Fortaleza Vermelha depois que Syrio Forel, seu mestre de espadas bravosiano, afasta os guardas enviados para prendê-la, enquanto Sansa é capturada. Robb ouve a notícia e prepara os exércitos do Norte para lutar contra os Lannisters, deixando Bran para trás para governar Winterfell. Lysa se recusa a lutar contra os Lannisters, e Catelyn sai para se juntar ao acampamento de Robb. Tyrion e Bronn estão cercados por Shagga, líder da tribo Stone Crows. Tyrion os convence a escoltá-lo até seu pai Tywin Lannister, que os pagará. No acampamento, Tywin pede a Shagga para ajudá-los a enfrentar os Starks em troca de um pagamento ainda maior. Na Muralha, alguns corpos afetados pelos Caminhantes Brancos são encontrados. Um desperta como um wight e ataca o Comandante Mormont, mas Jon o mata. Em Essos, os soldados de Drogo começam a atacar assentamentos próximos, escravizando os moradores locais para vendê-los e arrecadar dinheiro para comprar navios para cruzar o Mar Estreito. Drogo é ferido em uma luta. Joffrey nomeia seu avô, Tywin, como Mão do Rei. Sansa implora a Joffrey que mostre misericórdia a Ned. Joffrey concorda se Ned reconhecer publicamente a reivindicação de Joffrey ao trono e admitir ter cometido traição.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Os Lannisters pressionam sua vantagem sobre os Starks; Robb reúne os aliados do norte de seu pai e segue para o sul para a guerra; Os Caminhantes Brancos atacam a Muralha; Tyrion volta para seu pai com alguns novos amigos.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S01E8 - The Pointy End

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Arya escapes the Red Keep after Syrio Forel, her Braavosian sword master, fends off guards sent to arrest her, while Sansa is captured. Robb hears the news and prepares the Northern armies to fight the Lannisters, leaving Bran behind to rule Winterfell. Lysa refuses to fight the Lannisters, and Catelyn leaves to join Robb's camp. Tyrion and Bronn are surrounded by Shagga, leader of the Stone Crows tribe. Tyrion convinces them to escort him to his father Tywin Lannister, who will pay them. At the camp, Tywin asks Shagga to help them confront the Starks in exchange for even greater payment. At the Wall, some bodies affected by the White Walkers are found. One awakens as a wight and attack Commander Mormont, but Jon kills it. In Essos, Drogo's soldiers begin attacking nearby settlements, enslaving locals in order to sell them to raise money to buy ships to cross the Narrow Sea. Drogo is wounded in a fight. Joffrey appoints his grandfather, Tywin, as Hand of the King. Sansa begs Joffrey to show Ned mercy. Joffrey agrees if Ned publicly recognizes Joffrey's claim to the throne and admits to committing treason.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: The Lannisters press their advantage over the Starks; Robb rallies his father's northern allies and heads south to war; The White Walkers attack the Wall; Tyrion returns to his father with some new friends.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S01E8 - The Pointy End

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E8 - Hardhome

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Cersei's uncle, Kevan Lannister, is appointed as the Hand of the King. Cersei refuses to confess her crimes. H'ghar tasks Arya to study a marine insurance vendor who defrauds beneficiaries. Disguised as a shellfish peddler, she is to first learn about the insurer and then poison him. Theon tells Sansa that he faked killing Brandon and Rickon. Ramsay asks Roose for twenty men to attack Stannis's camp. In Meereen, Tyrion convinces Daenerys to spare Jorah's life; she does but exiles him again. Jorah returns to Yezzan and asks to fight in the pits. Daenerys accepts Tyrion into her council. Arriving in Hardhome, Jon and Tormund recruit five thousand Wildlings but an army of wights attacks them. Jon kills a White Walker with Longclaw, his Valyrian steel sword. As he, Tormund, and the other survivors escape by sea, they witness the Night King reanimating the dead Wildlings.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Tyrion advises Daenerys. Sansa forces Theon to tell her a secret. Cersei remains stubborn. Arya meets her first target. Jon and Tormund meet with the wildling elders.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E8 - Hardhome

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: A frota de Stannis ataca Porto Real. Sansa joga o jogo, tentando manipular Joffrey para liderar o ataque pessoalmente (na esperança de matá-lo), mas Joffrey fica com muito medo de lutar pessoalmente. Liderando a defesa, Tyrion destrói muitos navios atacantes com fogo, forçando Stannis a atacar em terra. Sandor Clegane lidera a defesa do lado de fora do portão, mas é derrotado e recua para dentro, denunciando Joffrey e saindo. Joffrey recua com medo enquanto Tyrion reúne os Mantos Dourados para lutar com ele. As forças de Stannis entram no castelo, mas Tyrion lidera seus homens atrás das forças de Stannis através de túneis e monta um ataque de retaguarda. Cersei vai para a sala do trono com Tommen, com a intenção de matá-lo para salvá-lo de ser capturado. Shae convence Sansa a se esconder em seu quarto. Sandor Clegane se oferece para levar Sansa para Winterfell, mas ela se recusa a sair. Enquanto Tyrion está ferido e Cersei está prestes a envenenar Tommen, as forças de Tywin, unidas por Loras, chegam e forçam Stannis a recuar.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: A frota e o exército de Stannis Baratheon chegam a Porto Real e a batalha pela cidade começa. Cersei planeja para ela e para o futuro de seus filhos.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E9 - Blackwater

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Stannis' fleet assaults King's Landing. Sansa plays the game, trying to manipulate Joffrey into leading the attack personally, (in hopes of getting him killed), but Joffrey turns out to be too afraid to fight personally. Leading the defense, Tyrion destroys many attacking ships with wildfire, forcing Stannis to attack on land. Sandor Clegane leads the defense outside the gate, but is defeated and retreats inside, denouncing Joffrey and leaving. Joffrey retreats in fear as Tyrion rallies the Gold Cloaks into fighting with him. Stannis' forces enter the castle, but Tyrion leads his men behind Stannis' forces via tunnels and mounts a rearguard attack. Cersei goes to the throne room with Tommen, intending to kill him to save him from being captured. Shae convinces Sansa to hide in her chamber. Sandor Clegane offers to take Sansa to Winterfell, but she refuses to leave. As Tyrion lies wounded and Cersei is about to poison Tommen, Tywin's forces, joined by Loras, arrive and force Stannis to retreat.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Stannis Baratheon's fleet and army arrive at King's Landing and the battle for the city begins. Cersei plans for her and her children's future.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E9 - Blackwater

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Catelyn chega ao acampamento de Renly para negociar uma aliança. A guerreira, Brienne de Tarth, ganha o direito de se juntar à guarda do rei de Renly através do combate. Renly se casou recentemente com Margaery Tyrell, irmã de Loras. Renly evita consumar o casamento dele e de Margaery devido à sua homossexualidade e relacionamento sexual com Loras. Nas Ilhas de Ferro, Balon planeja um ataque ao Norte, liderado por Yara. Depois de queimar sua carta para Robb alertando sobre o ataque iminente de Balon, Theon afirma sua fidelidade à Casa Greyjoy em uma cerimônia à base de água. Em Porto Real, Tyrion aprisiona Pycelle depois de determinar que ele é o informante de Cersei. Tyrion nomeia sua amante, Shae, como serva de Sansa, tanto para proteger Shae quanto para vigiar Sansa. Além da Muralha, Craster exige que os Vigilantes da Noite saiam. Jon descobre que Jeor Mormont sempre soube e ignorou os crimes incestuosos de Craster em troca do descanso de seus homens em sua fortaleza. No caminho para a muralha, os recrutas da Patrulha da Noite são atacados por soldados Lannister em busca de Gendry. Yoren é morto, e Arya e Gendry são feitos prisioneiros. Para proteger Gendry, Arya afirma falsamente que um menino que os guardas mataram era Gendry.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Tyrion tenta ver em quem pode confiar no Pequeno Conselho. Catelyn visita Renly para tentar convencê-lo a se juntar a Robb na guerra. Theon deve decidir se sua lealdade está com sua própria família ou com Robb.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E3 - What is Dead May Never Die
objects.__Episode__title_short: O Que Está Morto Não Pode Morrer

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Catelyn arrives at Renly's camp to negotiate an alliance. The female warrior, Brienne of Tarth, wins the right to join Renly's king's guard through combat. Renly has recently wed Margaery Tyrell, Loras's sister. Renly avoids consummating his and Margaery's marriage due to his homosexuality and sexual relationship with Loras. In the Iron Islands, Balon plans an attack on the North, led by Yara. After burning his letter to Robb warning of Balon's impending attack, Theon affirms his allegiance to House Greyjoy in a water-based ceremony. In King's Landing, Tyrion imprisons Pycelle after determining he is Cersei's informant. Tyrion appoints his lover, Shae, as Sansa's handmaiden, both to protect Shae and watch Sansa. Beyond the Wall, Craster demands the Night's Watchmen leave. Jon discovers that Jeor Mormont has always known about and ignored Craster's incestuous crimes in exchange for his men's respite at his keep. On the road to the wall, the Night's Watch recruits are attacked by Lannister soldiers searching for Gendry. Yoren is killed, and Arya and Gendry are taken prisoner. To protect Gendry, Arya falsely states that a boy the guards have killed was Gendry.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Tyrion tries to see who he can trust in the Small Council. Catelyn visits Renly to try and persuade him to join Robb in the war. Theon must decide if his loyalties lie with his own family or with Robb.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E3 - What is Dead May Never Die
objects.__Episode__title_short: What is Dead May Never Die

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Robb descobre que Catelyn libertou secretamente Jaime Lannister, que Brienne está escoltando para resgatá-lo em troca de Sansa e Arya; Robb coloca sua mãe em prisão domiciliar e envia homens para capturar Jaime. Robb é atraído por uma médica espirituosa, Talisa Maegyr, uma mulher de Volantis. Yara chega a Winterfell e critica a tomada de Theon por Theon, dizendo que não tem valor estratégico para os Ironborn. Ele se recusa a voltar para Pyke com ela. Quando Tywin deixa Harrenhal para atacar Robb, Arya coage H'ghar a ajudá-la, Gendry e seu amigo Torta Quente a escapar. Em Porto Real, Cersei tenta chantagear Tyrion sequestrando Ros, que a primeira acredita ser sua amante secreta. Joffrey castiga Varys por não ter mais conhecimento das posições dos Stark e se prepara para liderar o ataque contra o próprio Stannis. A caminho de Porto Real, Stannis promete fazer de Davos sua Mão do Rei. Além da Muralha, o líder selvagem, "Rattleshirt", leva os capturados Jon e Halfhand ao seu rei, Mance Rayder. No Punho dos Primeiros Homens, os irmãos da Patrulha da Noite encontram um esconderijo de armas de vidro de dragão, deixados lá por um irmão anterior da Patrulha da Noite. Em Qarth, Jorah concorda em acompanhar Daenerys à Casa dos Imortais para recuperar seus dragões. Brandon e Rickon são revelados vivos e escondidos em Winterfell.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Stannis está a poucos dias de Porto Real. Tyrion se prepara para sua chegada. Jon e Qhorin são feitos prisioneiros pelos selvagens. Catelyn é presa por libertar Jaime. Arya, Gendry e Torta Quente planejam escapar de Harrenhal.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E8 - The Prince of Winterfell

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Robb learns that Catelyn secretly freed Jaime Lannister, who Brienne is escorting to ransom him in exchange for Sansa and Arya; Robb places his mother under house arrest and sends men to capture Jaime. Robb is attracted to a spirited medic, Talisa Maegyr, a woman from Volantis. Yara arrives at Winterfell and criticizes Theon's seizing it, saying it has no strategic value to the Ironborn. He refuses to return to Pyke with her. When Tywin leaves Harrenhal to attack Robb, Arya coerces H'ghar into helping her, Gendry, and their friend, Hot Pie to escape. In King's Landing, Cersei attempts to blackmail Tyrion by abducting Ros, whom the former believes is his secret lover. Joffrey chastises Varys for not having more knowledge of Stark positions, and prepares to lead the attack against Stannis himself. En route to King's Landing, Stannis promises to make Davos his Hand of the King. Beyond the Wall, the Wildling leader, "Rattleshirt", leads the captured Jon and Halfhand to his king, Mance Rayder. At the Fist of the First Men, the brothers of the Night's Watch find a hidden cache of dragonglass weapons, left there by a previous Night's Watch brother. In Qarth, Jorah agrees to accompany Daenerys to the House of the Undying to retrieve her dragons. Brandon and Rickon are revealed to be alive and hiding in Winterfell.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Stannis is just days from King's Landing. Tyrion prepares for his arrival. Jon and Qhorin are taken prisoner by the wildlings. Catelyn is arrested for releasing Jaime. Arya, Gendry, and Hot Pie plan to escape from Harrenhal.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E8 - The Prince of Winterfell

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Em Essos, Davos e Stannis se encontram com o Banco de Ferro para garantir um empréstimo para Stannis. Davos reencontra Salladhor Saan e seus piratas. Em Meereen, Daenerys se adapta ao seu novo papel como rainha, ouvindo os intermináveis ​​pedidos de seus súditos, incluindo o nobre Hizdahr zo Loraq, que deseja recuperar o corpo de seu pai crucificado, e um camponês cujas cabras foram mortas pelos dragões cada vez mais incontroláveis ​​de Daenerys. No Forte do Pavor, Yara lidera uma missão para resgatar Theon, que, emocionalmente quebrado, se recusa a sair, forçando Yara a abandoná-lo. Ramsay recompensa a obediência de Theon e, planejando tomar Fosso Cailin, encarrega "Reek" de se passar por "Theon Greyjoy". Em Porto Real, Tywin coloca uma recompensa pela cabeça do Cão de Caça e instrui Varys a continuar espionando Daenerys. Tyrion é julgado pelo assassinato de Joffrey. Todas as testemunhas testemunham contra ele, incluindo Sor Meryn Trant, Grande Meistre Pycelle, Cersei e Varys, que dão depoimentos convincentes, embora circunstanciais. Para o choque de Tyrion, Shae testemunha falsamente contra ele. Tyrion proclama sua inocência e exige um julgamento por combate.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: O julgamento de Tyrion chegou. Yara e suas tropas invadem o Forte do Pavor para libertar Theon. Daenerys conhece Hizdar zo Loraq. Stannis faz um acordo com o Banco de Ferro de Bravos.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E6 - The Laws of Gods and Men
objects.__Episode__title_short: As Leis dos Deuses e dos Homens

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: In Essos, Davos and Stannis meet with the Iron Bank to secure a loan for Stannis. Davos re-engages Salladhor Saan and his pirates. In Meereen, Daenerys adapts to her new role as queen, hearing her subjects' endless requests, including nobleman Hizdahr zo Loraq who wishes to reclaim his crucified father's body, and a peasant man whose goats were killed by Daenerys' increasingly uncontrollable dragons. In the Dreadfort, Yara leads a mission to rescue Theon, who, emotionally broken, refuses to leave, forcing Yara to abandon him. Ramsay rewards Theon's obedience and, planning to take Moat Cailin, tasks "Reek" to impersonate "Theon Greyjoy". In King's Landing, Tywin puts a bounty on the Hound's head and instructs Varys to continue spying on Daenerys. Tyrion is tried for Joffrey's murder. All the witnesses testify against him, including Ser Meryn Trant, Grand Maester Pycelle, Cersei, and Varys, who give compelling, though circumstantial, testimony. To Tyrion's shock, Shae falsely testifies against him. Tyrion proclaims his innocence and demands a trial by combat.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Tyrion's trial has come. Yara and her troops storm the Dreadfort to free Theon. Daenerys meets Hizdar zo Loraq. Stannis makes a deal with the Iron Bank of Braavos.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E6 - The Laws of Gods and Men
objects.__Episode__title_short: The Laws of Gods and Men

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Sam, Gilly e seu filho chegam à Muralha. Enquanto se esconde em uma torre durante uma tempestade, Bran entra na mente de Hodor para evitar que ele revele seu esconderijo para os Selvagens abaixo com seus lamentos. Perto dali, Jon se recusa a matar um fazendeiro, a quem Ygritte mata; Jon é atacado pelos outros Selvagens, mas escapa. Bran usa sua habilidade warg para salvar Jon, que mata Orell antes de escapar, deixando uma furiosa Ygritte para trás com o chefe Tormund. Osha, Rickon e seu lobo gigante, Cão Felpudo, partem para a Última Lareira, enquanto Bran, Meera, Jojen, Hodor e o lobo gigante de Bran, Summer, planejam ir além da Muralha. Daenerys envia Jorah, Naharis e Grey Worm para se infiltrar em Yunkai e abrir o portão da cidade para seu exército. Os escravos Yunkai se rendem voluntariamente às suas forças. Robb chega às Gêmeas e pede desculpas a Walder por renegar seu acordo de se casar com uma filha Frey. Walder parece aceitar suas desculpas enquanto Edmure se casa com Roslin Frey, a única neta bonita de Walder. Depois que os recém-casados ​​saem da festa, os homens de Walder matam Catelyn, Talisa e os vassalos Stark, enquanto Roose Bolton, agora um leal aos Lannister, mata Robb. Sor Brynden Tully, tio de Catelyn, sobrevive, tendo se desculpado do banquete pouco antes do abate. O Cão de Caça e Arya chegam às Gêmeas durante o massacre, mas o Cão de Caça a leva para um lugar seguro.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Robb e Catelyn chegam às Gêmeas para o casamento. Jon é posto à prova para ver onde sua lealdade realmente está. O grupo de Bran decide se separar. Daenerys planeja uma invasão de Yunkai.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S03E9 - The Rains of Castamere

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Sam, Gilly, and her son arrive at the Wall. While hiding in a tower during a thunderstorm, Bran enters Hodor's mind to prevent his revealing their hiding place to Wildlings below with his laments. Nearby, Jon refuses to murder a farmer, whom Ygritte kills; Jon is attacked by the other Wildlings but escapes. Bran uses his warg ability to save Jon, who kills Orell before escaping, leaving a furious Ygritte behind with chief Tormund. Osha, Rickon, and his direwolf, Shaggydog, depart for the Last Hearth, while Bran, Meera, Jojen, Hodor and Bran's direwolf, Summer, plan to go beyond the Wall. Daenerys sends Jorah, Naharis, and Grey Worm to infiltrate Yunkai and open the city gate for her army. Yunkai slaves willingly surrender to her forces. Robb arrives at the Twins and apologizes to Walder for reneging on his agreement to marry a Frey daughter. Walder appears to accept his apology while Edmure marries Roslin Frey, Walder's sole pretty granddaughter. After the newlyweds leave the feast, Walder's men murder Catelyn, Talisa and the Stark bannermen, while Roose Bolton, now a Lannister loyalist, kills Robb. Ser Brynden Tully, Catelyn's uncle, survives, having excused himself from the feast just prior to the slaughter. The Hound and Arya arrive at the Twins during the massacre, but the Hound carries her to safety.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Robb and Catelyn arrive at the Twins for the wedding. Jon is put to the test to see where his loyalties truly lie. Bran's group decides to split up. Daenerys plans an invasion of Yunkai.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S03E9 - The Rains of Castamere

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Os Selvagens atacam a Cidade da Toupeira. Ygritte descobre Gilly se escondendo e poupa ela e Little Sam. Ramsay força Theon a negociar com os Ironborn para entregar Fosso Cailin. Os Ironborn concordam, esperando voltar para casa, mas Ramsay os esfola e os mata. Como recompensa por garantir o Fosso Cailin, Roose legitima Ramsay como um Bolton, tornando-o seu herdeiro. No Vale, Sansa diz ao conselho que investiga a morte de Lysa sua verdadeira identidade e afirma que Mindinho é inocente de assassinar sua tia. Enquanto Mindinho começa a preparar Robin como o Senhor do Vale, o Cão de Caça e Arya chegam, apenas para sair ao saber da morte de Lysa. Em Porto Real, começa o julgamento por combate. Oberyn ganha vantagem, mas momentaneamente relaxa sua guarda enquanto exige que Sor Gregor confesse seus crimes. Perto da morte, Sor Gregor tropeça em Oberyn e esmaga seu crânio enquanto se gaba de ter estuprado e assassinado Elia. Tywin condena Tyrion à morte. Em Essos, Verme Cinzento e Missandei se aproximam. Barristan Selmy intercepta um perdão há muito atrasado do Rei Robert para Jorah como recompensa por espionar Daenerys. Ela então exila Jorah de Meereen como resultado.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Theon ajuda Ramsay a capturar Fosso Cailin. Os selvagens atacam a Cidade da Toupeira. Sansa inventa uma história para proteger Lord Baelish. Daenerys descobre um segredo sobre Jorah Mormont. Oberyn Martell enfrenta Gregor Clegane, a Montanha.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E8 - The Mountain and the Viper

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: The Wildlings attack Mole's Town. Ygritte discovers Gilly hiding and spares her and Little Sam. Ramsay forces Theon to negotiate with the Ironborn to surrender Moat Cailin. The Ironborn agree, hoping to return home, but Ramsay flays and slaughters them. As a reward for securing Moat Cailin, Roose legitimizes Ramsay as a Bolton, making him his heir. In the Vale, Sansa tells the council investigating Lysa's death her true identity and claims that Littlefinger is innocent of murdering her aunt. While Littlefinger starts grooming Robin as the Lord of the Vale, the Hound and Arya arrive, only to leave upon learning of Lysa's death. In King's Landing, the trial by combat begins. Oberyn gains the upper hand but momentarily relaxes his guard while demanding that Ser Gregor confess his crimes. Near death, Ser Gregor trips Oberyn and crushes his skull while boasting that he raped and murdered Elia. Tywin sentences Tyrion to death. In Essos, Grey Worm and Missandei grow closer. Barristan Selmy intercepts a long-delayed pardon from King Robert for Jorah as a reward for spying on Daenerys. She then exiles Jorah from Meereen as a result.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Theon helps Ramsay seize Moat Cailin. The wildlings attack Mole's Town. Sansa comes up with a story to protect Lord Baelish. Daenerys finds out a secret about Jorah Mormont. Oberyn Martell faces Gregor Clegane, the Mountain.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E8 - The Mountain and the Viper

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Ao retornar a Porto Real, Tyrion para em Winterfell, onde apresenta aos Stark um design de sela que permitirá ao paraplégico Bran andar a cavalo. Ned investiga secretamente a morte de Jon Arryn. No processo, ele descobre um dos filhos ilegítimos do rei Robert, Gendry, um armeiro. Robert e seus convidados participam de um torneio em homenagem a Ned, que Ned considera uma extravagância. Jon toma medidas para proteger Samwell Tarly, um recruta da Patrulha da Noite desajeitado e sem amigos, do abuso dos outros Watchmen. Um Viserys frustrado entra em conflito com sua irmã recém-empoderada. Sansa sonha em um dia se tornar rainha, enquanto Arya imagina um futuro muito diferente. Em uma taverna à beira da estrada, Catelyn, que é filha de Lorde Hoster Tully, inesperadamente encontra Tyrion Lannister. Ela reúne os aliados de seu pai em Correrrio para prender Tyrion por conspirar para assassinar seu filho.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Eddard investiga o assassinato de Jon Arryn. Jon faz amizade com Samwell Tarly, um covarde que veio para se juntar à Patrulha da Noite.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S01E4 - Cripples, Bastards, and Broken Things

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: While returning to King's Landing, Tyrion stops at Winterfell where he presents the Starks a saddle design that will allow the paraplegic Bran to ride a horse. Ned secretly investigates Jon Arryn's death. In the process, he discovers one of King Robert's illegitimate children, Gendry, an armorer. Robert and his guests attend a tournament honoring Ned, which Ned considers an extravagance. Jon takes measures to protect Samwell Tarly, an awkward and friendless Night's Watch recruit, from the other Watchmen's abuse. A frustrated Viserys clashes with his newly-empowered sister. Sansa dreams of one day becoming queen, while Arya envisions a far different future. At a roadside tavern, Catelyn, who is Lord Hoster Tully's daughter, unexpectedly encounters Tyrion Lannister. She rallies her father's Riverrun allies to arrest Tyrion for conspiring to murder her son.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Eddard investigates Jon Arryn's murder. Jon befriends Samwell Tarly, a coward who has come to join the Night's Watch.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S01E4 - Cripples, Bastards, and Broken Things

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E7 - The Gift

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Jon leaves for Hardhome with Tormund and some rangers. Maester Aemon dies shortly after. Gilly is attacked by two Watchmen. Samwell intervenes and is overpowered until Ghost threatens them. Samwell and Gilly consummate their relationship. Sansa begs Theon to help her escape Winterfell, but instead he informs Ramsay, who then flays Brienne's informant inside Winterfell. At his army camp, Stannis refuses Melisandre request to sacrifice Shireen to gain the God of Lights favor. Jorah and Tyrion are sold to slaver, Qaggaz, and are taken to Daznak's fighting pit. Daenerys and her consort, Loraq, inspect the pit in preparation for the upcoming games. Jorah defeats the other fighters, reveals his identity and Tyrion appears as his "gift" to her. In Dorne, while in the dungeon, Tyene Sand gives Bronn the antidote to a poison called "The Long Farewell" that she has infected him with. Prince Doran allows Jaime take Myrcella and her fiance, Prince Trystane, to King's Landing. The High Sparrow denies Olenna's demand that Loras and Margaery be released. The High Sparrow then arrests Cersei for her previous affair with her cousin Lancel.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Jon heads east as trouble begins to stir for Sam and Gilly at Castle Black. Sansa asks Theon for help. Tyrion and Jorah are sold as slaves. Cersei savors her triumph over the Tyrells as new plots are developed in the shadows.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E7 - The Gift

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Tywin supervisiona o reforjamento de Gelo, a espada de aço valiriano ancestral da Casa Stark, em duas novas. Um é para Jaime, que lamenta a perda de sua mão de espada e o amor de Cersei, e o outro é um presente de casamento para o Rei Joffrey, que Joffrey chama de Lamento da Viúva. O príncipe Oberyn Martell, representando seu irmão enfermo, o príncipe Doran de Dorne, chega a Porto Real para participar do casamento real. Ele e sua amante, Ellaria Sand, são recebidos por Tyrion. Oberyn secretamente busca vingança contra os Lannister e Gregor Clegane pelo estupro e assassinato de sua irmã, Elia, esposa do infiel Príncipe Rhaegar Targaryen. No Norte, Styr e os canibais Thenns reforçam Tormund, Ygritte e os outros Selvagens. Meistre Aemon absolve Jon depois que ele explica suas ações enquanto estava com os Selvagens e revela que seu exército de 100.000 planeja atacar Castelo Negro. Nas Terras Fluviais, o Cão de Caça e Arya vão para o Ninho da Águia, onde o Cão de Caça pretende resgatar Arya para sua tia Lysa, a viúva de Jon Arryn. Ao longo do caminho, Arya recupera sua espada, Needle, de Polliver, matando-o. Em Essos, Daenerys marcha seu exército em direção a Meereen, a última das três grandes cidades escravas; ela teme estar perdendo o controle sobre seus dragões em crescimento, agora do tamanho de cavalos.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Tyrion recebe um convidado em Porto Real. Em Castelo Negro, Jon é julgado. Daenerys é apontada para Meereen, a mãe de todas as cidades escravas. Arya encontra um velho inimigo.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E1 - Two Swords

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Tywin oversees the reforging of Ice, House Stark's ancestral Valyrian steel sword, into two new ones. One is for Jaime, who grieves the loss of his sword hand and Cersei's love, and the other is a wedding present for King Joffrey, which Joffrey names Widow's Wail. Prince Oberyn Martell, representing his infirmed brother, Prince Doran of Dorne, arrives in King's Landing to attend the royal wedding. He and his paramour, Ellaria Sand, are greeted by Tyrion. Oberyn secretly seeks revenge against the Lannisters and Gregor Clegane for the rape and murder of his sister, Elia, wife of the unfaithful Prince Rhaegar Targaryen. In the North, Styr and the cannibalistic Thenns reinforce Tormund, Ygritte and the other Wildlings. Maester Aemon absolves Jon after he explains his actions while with the Wildlings and reveals that their army of 100,000 plans to attack Castle Black. In the Riverlands, the Hound and Arya head to the Eyrie where the Hound intends to ransom Arya to her Aunt Lysa, Jon Arryn's widow. Along the way, Arya reclaims her sword, Needle, from Polliver, killing him. In Essos, Daenerys marches her army towards Meereen, the last of the three great slave cities; she fears she is losing control over her growing dragons, now horse-sized.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Tyrion welcomes a guest to King's Landing. At Castle Black, Jon stands trial. Daenerys is pointed to Meereen, the mother of all slave cities. Arya runs into an old enemy.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E1 - Two Swords

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Theon e seus homens perseguem Brandon e Rickon. Tywin tem Harrenhal procurado pelo assassino de seu oficial. Jon recaptura Ygritte, mas ela escapa novamente, levando-o a uma armadilha. Ainda abalada pelo tumulto, Sansa fica horrorizada por ter começado a menstruar e agora ter idade suficiente para se casar e ter filhos de Joffrey. Cersei a avisa para não amar ninguém além de seus filhos, nem mesmo Joffrey. No acampamento de Robb, a fuga fracassada de Jaime deixa um guarda morto e alguns soldados em busca de vingança. Em Qarth, o feiticeiro Pree diz que roubou os dragões de Daenerys; ele oferece a ela a oportunidade de se reunir com eles, então massacra o Conselho dos Treze e estabelece Daxos como rei. Em Winterfell, Theon apresenta os cadáveres carbonizados de dois meninos de fazenda ao Meistre Luwin, alegando que são Brandon e Rickon.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Bran e Rickon escaparam de Winterfell. Theon tenta caçá-los. Os dragões de Daenerys foram roubados. Jon viaja pelo deserto com Ygritte como sua prisioneira. Sansa sangrou e agora está pronta para ter filhos de Joffrey.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E7 - A Man Without Honor

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Theon and his men pursue Brandon and Rickon. Tywin has Harrenhal searched for his officer's killer. Jon recaptures Ygritte, but she escapes again, leading him into a trap. Still shaken from the riot, Sansa is horrified that she has begun menstruating and is now old enough to marry and bear Joffrey's children. Cersei warns her to love no one but her children, not even Joffrey. In Robb's camp, Jaime's failed escape leaves a guard dead and some soldiers seeking retribution. In Qarth, the warlock Pree says he stole Daenerys' dragons; he offers her the opportunity to reunite with them, then slaughters the Council of Thirteen and establishes Daxos as king. In Winterfell, Theon presents the charred corpses of two farm boys to Maester Luwin, claiming they are Brandon and Rickon.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Bran and Rickon have escaped Winterfell. Theon tries to hunt them down. Daenerys' dragons have been stolen. Jon travels through the wilderness with Ygritte as his prisoner. Sansa has bled and is now ready to have Joffrey's children.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E7 - A Man Without Honor

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Roose Bolton retorna ao Forte do Pavor com sua noiva, uma das filhas de Walder Frey. Ele castiga Ramsay por torturar e castrar Theon, desvalorizando-o como refém. Theon, que se degenerou em uma persona subserviente chamada 'Reek', revela que Bran e Rickon Stark estão vivos e ameaçam a legitimidade de Roose como Protetor do Norte. Roose ordena que Ramsay recupere os territórios sob ocupação Ironborn, prometendo uma recompensa se ele conseguir. Em Pedra do Dragão, Melisandre sacrifica três pessoas, incluindo o cunhado de Stannis, queimando-os até a morte como um tributo ao Senhor da Luz, encantando a Rainha Selyse e nojento Sor Davos e a Princesa Shireen. Para proteger Shae de sua família, Tyrion consegue mandá-la para Pentos em Essos, deixando-a angustiada. Bronn treina Jaime na esgrima com a mão esquerda. Rei Joffrey e Margaery Tyrell estão casados. Durante a festa do Casamento Real, Joffrey humilha Tyrion e insulta Sansa pouco antes de Joffrey sucumbir fatalmente ao vinho envenenado. Uma Cersei perturbada prende Tyrion por seu assassinato, enquanto Sor Dontos, um ex-cavaleiro, convence Sansa a deixar o banquete com ele para sua proteção.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: O casamento de Joffrey e Margaery chegou. Tyrion termina com Shae. Ramsay tenta provar seu valor para seu pai. Bran e companhia encontram uma árvore Weirwood.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E2 - The Lion and the Rose

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Roose Bolton returns to the Dreadfort with his bride, one of Walder Frey's daughters. He chastises Ramsay for torturing and castrating Theon, devaluing him as a hostage. Theon, who has degenerated into a subservient persona called 'Reek', discloses that Bran and Rickon Stark are alive and threaten Roose's legitimacy as Warden of the North. Roose orders Ramsay to reclaim the territories under Ironborn occupation, promising a reward if he succeeds. In Dragonstone, Melisandre sacrifices three people, including Stannis' brother-in-law, burning them to death as a tribute to the Lord of Light, delighting Queen Selyse and disgusting Ser Davos and Princess Shireen. To protect Shae from his family, Tyrion arranges to send her to Pentos on Essos, leaving her distressed. Bronn coaches Jaime in left-handed swordplay. King Joffrey and Margaery Tyrell are wed. During the Royal Wedding feast, Joffrey humiliates Tyrion and taunts Sansa just before Joffrey fatally succumbs to poisoned wine. A distraught Cersei has Tyrion arrested for his murder, while Ser Dontos, a former knight, persuades Sansa to leave the feast with him for her protection.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Joffrey and Margaery's wedding has come. Tyrion breaks up with Shae. Ramsay tries to prove his worth to his father. Bran and company find a Weirwood tree.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E2 - The Lion and the Rose

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: No Norte, Jojen diz a Bran que eles não devem parar no Castelo Negro, mas viajar além da Muralha para encontrar o Corvo de Três Olhos; Osha os avisa sobre os mortos-vivos. O relacionamento de Jon e Ygritte se aprofunda, irritando o ciumento Wildling, Orell. O torturador de Theon o castra. Robb descobre que Talisa está grávida. Arya escapa da Irmandade, apenas para ser capturada por Sandor. Melisandre diz a Gendry que seu pai era o rei Robert. Shae avisa Tyrion que seu relacionamento terminará quando ele se casar com Sansa. Tywin e Joffrey discutem sobre Daenerys; Tywin a descarta como uma ameaça em potencial. Daenerys chega a Yunkai e declara guerra à cidade. Roose Bolton deixa Harrenhal para o casamento de Edmure Tully enquanto Jaime se despede de Brienne ao partir para Porto Real. Na estrada, Jaime descobre que Locke recusou o resgate do pai de Brienne. Jaime retorna a Harrenhal para encontrar Brienne em um poço lutando contra um urso. Ele salva Brienne, e eles partem juntos.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Jon e os selvagens viajam ao sul da Muralha. Talisa diz a Robb que está grávida. Arya foge da Irmandade. Daenerys chega a Yunkai. Jaime deixa Brienne para trás em Harrenhal.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S03E7 - The Bear and the Maiden Fair
objects.__Episode__title_short: O Urso e a Bela Donzela

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: In the North, Jojen tells Bran they must not stop at Castle Black, but travel beyond the Wall to find the Three-eyed Raven; Osha warns them about the walking dead. Jon and Ygritte's relationship deepens, angering jealous Wildling, Orell. Theon's torturer castrates him. Robb learns Talisa is pregnant. Arya escapes the Brotherhood, only to be captured by Sandor. Melisandre tells Gendry that his father was King Robert. Shae warns Tyrion that their relationship will end once he marries Sansa. Tywin and Joffrey discuss Daenerys; Tywin dismisses her as a potential threat. Daenerys reaches Yunkai and declares war on the city. Roose Bolton leaves Harrenhal for Edmure Tully's wedding while Jaime bids Brienne farewell as he departs for King's Landing. On the road, Jaime learns Locke has refused Brienne's father's ransom. Jaime returns to Harrenhal to find Brienne in a pit fighting a bear. He saves Brienne, and they depart together.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Jon and the wildlings travel south of the Wall. Talisa tells Robb that she's pregnant. Arya runs away from the Brotherhood. Daenerys arrives at Yunkai. Jaime leaves Brienne behind at Harrenhal.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S03E7 - The Bear and the Maiden Fair
objects.__Episode__title_short: The Bear and the Maiden Fair

objects.title: Always - All devices, all non-kids customer types
